p: Analytical grade chemicals were used without further purification for all the experiments. The monomer 3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene (EDOT, TCI), tetrabutyl ammonium perchlorate (TBAClO 4, Fluka), acetonitrile (E-Merck), copper sulphate (Hi Media), sodium perchlorate (Sigma-Aldrich), sulphuric acid (E-Merck), palladium (II) chloride (sigma-Aldrich) and acetonitrile (ACN) were pure and used as received.
